content: don t twist starting chains ring 3 princess snake freeamigurumi patternby@leta toyfox head worked in the round top down with turquoise yarn round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 6inc 12 round 3 *3 1inc 1sc *3 24sc 66 round 17-18 66sc * 2rnds + 1sc extra 66 insert safety eyes between rounds 13 and 14 with 7-8sts apart secure them with plastic washers from inside you can watch a short video at link how to insert and secure safety eyes round 19 7sc 2sc 1dec 2sc *3 16sc 60 2sc 1dec 2sc *3 7sc round 20 7sc 3sc 1dec *3 16sc 1dec 3sc *3 7sc 54 round 21 7sc 1dec *6 48 round 22 3sc 1dec 3sc *6 42 round 23 5sc 1dec *6 36 round 24 2sc 1dec 2sc *6 30 round 25 3sc 1dec *6 24 round 26 1sc 1dec 1sc *6 + 2sc extra 18 i made 2sc extra to place future tummy 6sts right under eyes please see photo ↑ perhaps you will need less/more/no need extra stitches stuff the head round 27 flo 18sc 18 4 princess snake freeamigurumi patternby@leta toyfox body continue with changing colors turquoise a and cream b stuff not very firmly as you go round 28 6sc turquoise blo 6sc cream 6sc turquoise 18 rnds 29-52 6sc turquoise blo 6sc cream 6sc turquoise * 24rnds 18 round 53 7sc turquoise blo 4sc cream 7sc turquoise 18 round 54 8sc turquoise blo 3sc cream 7sc turquoise 18 cut cream yarn and continue with turquoise yarn only you can continue to stuff the body as you go remember to stuff not very firmly to roll body into ring or to tie it with a knot in the final i didn t stuff the body after round 54 at all rnds 55-67 18sc * 13rnds 18 round 68 8sc 1dec 8sc 17 round 69-71 17sc * 3rnds 17 round 72 15sc 1dec 16 rnds 73-75 16sc * 3rnds 16 round 76 7sc 1dec 7sc 15 rnds 77-81 15sc * 5rnds 15 round 82 13sc 1dec 14 rnds 83-85 14sc * 3rnds 14 round 85 6sc 1dec 6sc 13 round 86 13sc 13 round 87 11sc needle 5 princess snake
